DataElement.preferredName: Medication COX-2 Inhibitor Use Twice Weekly Month or more Frequency Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using a subgroup of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID) that specifically targets at cyclooxygenase 2, an enzyme involved in pain and inflammation._Two times per week._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)_An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using a subgroup of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID) that specifically targets at cyclooxygenase 2, an enzyme involved in pain and inflammation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subgroup of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID) that specifically targets at cyclooxygenase 2, an enzyme involved in pain and inflammation.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: A subgroup of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAID) that specifically targets at cyclooxygenase 2, an enzyme involved in pain and inflammation.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the units of measure for assessment results and dosing.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have you ever taken Cox-2 inh
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you ever taken Cox-2 inhibitor medications, at least 2 times a week for a month or more? Examples are Celebrex, Vioxx, Bextra, Valdecoxib, Elecoxib, Celecoxib and Rofecoxib.
